topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55726c7063687223523f0500#post_55726c7063687223523f0500
You know how Adolf Hitler got his iconic toothbrush moustache?
He had a full bushy moustache. During WW1 the trenches were a very big target for gas bombs. Mostly mustard gas. So soldiers need to have a gas-mask on their person at all times. And if you want to wear ome properly you can't have a large moustache. So he was basically forced to trim it down
